price: Hakika mimi kwenu ni Mtume muaminifu.
footnotes: Hakika mimi nimetumwa na Mola Mlezi wa walimwengu wote nikuongoeni na nikuongozeni. Nami ni muaminifu wa kuufikisha ujumbe wake kwenu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
